title: I Was Reincarnated as a Villainous Young Lady, but I Have No Desire to Get Married!
I Became a Divorce Lawyer for My First Love
The Villainess Wants to Coexist
summary:
A heart-pounding reemployment(!?) story between a fed-up corporate slave and a cold, callous, villainess!

Three years after graduating college, Natori Midori, who once idealized the "grown-up adults" she saw as a child, is working hard at her job as a temporary employee. However, one day, her contract is suddenly terminated for an absurd reason. As she sits there, wondering if there would ever be a workplace for her to devote herself to, her phone flashes and she finds herself in the world of the novel RPG she was playing. And before her eyes is the villainess, Lapis Tenebrae, who betrayed the heroine and committed countless atrocities before losing her life!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/60556)

title: The Young Villainess Sees Through It All
summary: Although born into an aristocrat family, Alicia has always faced mistreatment. The main reason was her being an illegitimate child. The only person who showered her affection was her younger sister, Lilian. But she too ended up betraying her which resulted to her untimely death. After waking up, Alicia finds herself back to her seven-year-old self. She notices a ring shining on her finger and she realizes that she’s suddenly able to read people’s inner thoughts. With her “child-like form” and her “mind-reading ability,” she plans to take revenge as a young villainess.

title: 1 Year No More
summary: Yuu Arizuki returned to his hometown after quitting his job at an exploitative company in Tokyo. Just as he was getting ready to start a new life back home, he met a beautiful and innocent high school girl, who turned out to be Haruyama Miya, one of the little girls (brats) Isamu used to play with when he was young. But Isamu didn't recognize her because of how much she had changed after growing up...?

title: How to Turn a Gentle Male Lead Into an Obsessive Male Lead
High school queen
summary:
"Hey, wanna do it?"

One late night, Yamamoto, a college student working part-time at a convenience store, reunites with Hayashi Megumi, his high school classmate and the most beautiful girl in their class. Known as the "Queen" for her strong-willed and arrogant personality, Yamamoto had always found her difficult to get along with. However, during a routine conversation, he notices painful bruises on her wrist. After learning that her boyfriend had been abusing her, Yamamoto decides to let Hayashi stay at his place...!?

title: The Villainess is Done Trying
summary: What would you do when you've transmigrated as the most-hated villainess in the story? In the case of Marso, she tried hard to change the storyline by performing good deeds and taking care of the female lead. However, things are not going as she had hoped for--every character in the story still hates her! It seems no matter what she does she cannot seem to change her fate. Tired of trying, Marso declares that she'll stay home and do nothing--for the rest of her life.

title: Maseknam – A Sexy Magician
summary:
Idol of the magician world, Korea's greatest magician, Ma Masung!

One day in the middle of Gwanghwamun, a woman in a swimsuit fell into his sports car and shouted, "Your Highness the Crown Prince!"

Chundong, who's been living in Korea after losing the memories of her past, recognises Masung as the Crown Prince 'Lee Ho' from Joseon as soon as she touches Masung's body... 

Chundong, a Joseon shaman, and Donggung Palace where the 'Gate of Time' is opened. 

Masung, a magician with 'mysterious power'. 

A magical romance that crosses over 500 years now unfolds.

title: It’s Just a Superficial Intention
summary: In her previous life, Zheng Wenyan, the future star of Yongdong Group, mistakenly trusted the scumbag Zhao Yushun, married him, and cultivated him with all her strength to help him take revenge on the Li family, but she eventually discovered that Zhao Yushun had been having an affair with his second uncle's cousin Zheng Minzhen. Zheng Wenyan was completely betrayed and died with hatred. Now, Zheng Wenyan has been reborn and returned to the day when she was about to get the marriage certificate with Zhao Yushun. She is determined to rewrite history and make the betrayers pay the price!

title: I’m A Super Rich Man, So It’s Reasonable For Me To Be A Scumbag
summary: Jiang Cheng woke up and was reborn! He was also bound to the Godly Rich System. Every second the world runs, he can get money! As the system continues to upgrade, Jiang Cheng's wealth has skyrocketed. All the cool school beauties and queen bosses are around him. Jiang Cheng laughed up to the sky. In his previous life, he was trapped by the things that he couldn't get when he was young for so long. Now that he is reborn, who cares about those broken rules! Let's drink and enjoy it first.

title: All Hail the Sect Leader
summary: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!

title: A Blank Slate Regression for the Idol That Lost His Original Mindset
summary:
‘I want to do real music now instead of these fucking idol songs.’

Yoon Eden, an idol in his 8th year, was tired of working with his shitty agency so he worked on the side as a composer.
He succeeded in music composition and bought a house in Cheongdam-dong, but has become an arrogant celebrity.

[Your 30,000th fan is disappointed in you.]
[Starting a project to help idols regain their lost, original intentions!]

But what the hell? He was sent to his debut days when his group was at its lowest to find his original intentions-

[The conditions have been met.]
[You have disappointed 30 thousand fans, now make 30 million fans happy!]

There’s even a mission that's only possible to complete for 1st tier idols?!

“Fuck, my Cheongdam-dong house! My billion-dollar royalties! My Ferrari!”

[Profanity detected.] [Original Intent -2]

[When Original Intent falls to 0, you start over again!]

Even in these harsh conditions that threaten infinite regression, will the project help this idol find his lost, original intentions?

title: After Prison: The Real Heiress Claps Back
Hold Her Tighter So She Wouldn’t Run Away
summary: After three failed marriages, Archduke Theo de Phoenix has long accepted that love simply isn’t in the cards for him. After all, who could love a war-hardened monster like him? So when his fourth bride arrives, he greets her covered in blood, gives her a shabby attic for a room, and keeps his distance. Surely, this one will run too. But Yuelina is not like the others. To Theo’s disbelief, she welcomes his presence and fills his cold world with warmth and light. As the walls around his heart begin to thaw, will Theo finally allow himself to love?

title: Your Majesty the King, I Will Educate You
Worthless Profession: Dragon Tamer
summary:
Luke Foster thought he was doomed when he awakened as a Dragon Tamer, the most useless hidden profession in existence. 

Dragons are so rare and powerful that for eight centuries, no Dragon Tamer has ever succeeded in taming a dragon. But without one, he can't even unlock his basic skills, leaving him powerless in a world ruled by fighters. 
Then everything changes after Luke activates the **Super Treasure Map System**. The mysterious system leads him to the ultimate prize: a real dragon egg! And so, this "***weak***" Dragon Tamer is about to flip the world upside down.

title: ugly complex
summary:
Ajin, who's only interested in baking, is a loyal girl who thinks "the Friendship is the best!"
When the super handsome Junwoo approaches her, an ordinary girl with glasses and braces,
her daily life begins to go awry…
"Why are you so mean to me?"
"Because I like you."
A truly heart-fluttering school romance between the straightforward Junwoo and the innocent Ajin!

title: Putting My Life on the Line, I Go All-in on Luck Enhancement
summary:
Despite his terrible luck in life, Ted was a top livestreaming musketeer in the fully immersive VR game, Face Chronicle. 

But his bad luck made him stumble upon a conspiracy where major guilds were illegally taming boss monsters to get ahead. They were far from happy when Ted threatened to expose them, so they coerced him into deleting his game character, which forced him to start over. 

Can Ted turn his luck around by starting all over from level one? Or will his bad luck ruin his last shot?

title: My Fake Love
summary: Lynette, in place of her sister, is to marry Alfred, a rumored playboy who wants a young lady who can "wrap men around her fingers". In order to avoid being kicked out, she tries to act like the villainess Alfred wants, but his reaction isn't so good!? On the other hand, Alfred isn't actually a playboy either, but a very pure and innocent novice in love matters. But he decides to pretend to be a playboy in order to find out the intentions of Lynette, who was sent by the rival queen, are!?

title: I Will Not be Overshadowed by my Twin Sister in This Life
My God Is a Lustful Man
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: It’s Finally Love, Demon Lord!
summary:

title: Only Love
summary:
Rintarou, the boy I've been friends with since we were small. Large, grim, popular. He turned down a girl again… What a waste!

“No, because I love you.”

…Huh? What!? That's the first time I've heard about this!!! W-w-w-why me-

Damn…!!! I can't believe he would confess to me. I feel like I lost and it's frustrating. Now that it's come to this, I'll test him and see if he's good enough to be my boyfriend!!

title: My Husband Who Hates Me Has Lost His Memories
summary: In a politically arranged marriage devoid of love, Lily is wed to Theodore, the head of a rival family. Theodore loathes the union, but little does he know that Lily despises her own family as much as he does. Living a quiet life, she counts the days until their inevitable divorce. Then fate intervenes—a sudden accident erases Theodore’s memories of her, transforming his coldness into unexpected affection. Can Lily trust this dramatic shift, or must she guard her heart to avoid future heartbreak?

title: One and only
summary: Yakumo is an adventurer who was expelled from the "Holy Sword Group" after his unique skill [Paper Mastery] was determined to be a small fry skill. However, as a result of protecting his friends during the final dungeon capture, another unique skill [Maximum Magic] awakens! Instantly kills a powerful monster solo. Yakumo decides to take on a request from the guild as a solo soloist. On the way, Armine, a beautiful elf alchemist, comes across a place where she is being attacked by monsters. When I helped her with her awakened power, she invited me to join her own party...!? Is the skill to manipulate "paper" a "god" skill? Become the strongest!

title: I’ll Save a Decent Family
summary:
Ji-Woo Lee, an author gets reincarnated into her novel as Tara Elias, the 5th daughter of the Elias family. However, the family is supposed to fall soon, and everyone in it will be executed. Ji-Woo insists that she will escape her fate.  
  
"I thought everything was going smoothly."  
  
That is, until she meets the second prince. Prince Kyle Amur.

---
*They walked over me. Now I rule over them.*

After being murdered, Yeonwoo is reincarnated as Tara Elias, the unremarkable and incompetent 5th daughter of the Elias family. How will Tara Elias, the nobody of the family, save the entire household from its grisly ending and become the ruler of the kingdom?

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55629319)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%9D%ED%95%A0-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%84-%EC%82%B4%EB%A0%A4%EB%B3%B4%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2381), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54740855)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://manta.net/series/1376)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28061)
* [French / Français](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/the-falling-family-and-me)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Ill-Save-the-Falling-Family/243)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/54807)
* [Vietnamese / Tiếng Việt](https://pops.vn/comics/ta-se-cuu-lay-gia-toc-suy-tan-nay-5eeacb5be3d0a70034a66c97)

title: Living as the Enemy Prince
summary:
Imagine being kin to your sworn enemy.

Killed in battle while defending his country, Bern wakes up in the body of the enemy prince, Kalian, and vows to avenge his people. But between taming an abusive half-brother and surviving his mother's deadly web of intrigue, sweet revenge seems to slip further beyond his grasp at every turn.

---
I could hear the hum of life in my ears. It was hard to breathe… I raised my gaze and stared into the distance. However, my blurred vision could not see anything. The light began to fade. That was my last memory.

When I opened my eyes once again, it was ten years before that last memory took place. And of all the things I could have become, it was from the enemy country that drove Secretia to ruin – I had become Kyris' third prince, Calian.

…..

Bern was the proud Crown Prince of Secretia who fought and died in the war against Kyris. But he woke up ten years into the past – as the timid Third Prince of Kyris, Calian.

title: You Are So Cute
summary:
Forget "saving face," this is "saved by face!"
Roseny has been masquerading as a boy for years at the orphanage. But when the duke chooses her to be a playmate for his son, it isn't long before her secret is revealed. Instead of being sent back, her adorable complexion results in Roseny being adopted! What will this new future hold for her?

title: Protecting the Witch’s Son
summary: One day, high schooler Hoshina Shuuji, who can sense peoples' feelings through his ordinary five senses, accidentally sees the popular Ayachi Nene masturbating in the school library. Nene is a member of the Occult Club, and commonly offers her classmates advice through fortune-telling. When Shuuji goes to apologize to her, he learns two things: the Occult Club is going to be closed due to lack of members, and Nene is actually a witch that is collecting 'soul fragments' that come from strong emotions. After he accidentally absorbs her collection of soul fragments, he decides to join her club, help her collect more, and try to find a way to give back the ones he took.

title: The Villain of the Octagon
summary:
Gu Changge, a traveller from another world, comes to realize that he is the villain in this world. However, with his noble background, unrivalled abilities, and a cheat system that penalizes the protagonist, he is ready to steal the protagonist’s thunder and win the female lead’s heart…

---

**Original Webtoon:**  
- [KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12602/)

**Official Translations:**  
- **Japanese**: 
  - [Piccoma](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119582)   
- **Korean**: 
   - [Kakao](https://page.kakao.com/content/61188260)  

- **English Ongoing**:

  - [Mangatoon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/i-am-the-fated-villain?content_id=3446131)
  - [Alandal](https://alandal.com/series/comic-i-am-the-fated-villain)
  - [Renta](https://www.ebookrenta.com/renta/sc/frm/item/146190/)

---

- **English Discontinued**:  
  - [Voyceme](https://www.voyce.me/series/i-am-the-fated-villain)

title: It’s My First Time Being Loved
summary:
As the only hope to stop the end of the world, I’ve lived 99 lives with everyone pressuring me to sacrifice myself. I dearly hoped this life would be my last…!

“A lady is born!”

I’ve ended up beginning my 100th life. They’re going to give me a hero treatment and sacrifice me again anyways. Is what I thought, but—

“Thank you for being born safely.”
“Unnie’s gon to get dem all for you!”
“Can I please see our youngest smiling as well?”
“Hey little baby, did you miss me?”

This life is a bit… weird.

title: Evolution Begins With A Big Tree
summary: One minute, he was choking on water, and the next, he found himself in a canyon and turned into a willow tree! Before he could reconcile with this new sad reality, the world decided to throw him another curveball. With the return of spirit energy, every living thing started to mutate, and his life was soon turned into a game of survival. Luckily, he was gifted with the ability of infinite evolution. But was it really a blessing? Or was it also a curse in disguise?

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: I Rely on My Invincibility to Deal Tons of Damage Passively!
summary: In his previous life, Cheng Qianmo attained the prestigious title of ‘God’ across all professions in the game ‘Genesis,’ poised to ascend to the pinnacle of the gaming world. However, just when he stood on the cusp of becoming the game’s top player, he suffered a regrettable defeat. Yet, fate granted Cheng Qianmo a second chance as he unexpectedly traversed into a world with a setting eerily identical to ‘Genesis,’ a world where everyone could switch professions freely. Armed with the god-tier title across all professions, he resolves to rectify his past regrets, embarking on a path no one has ever tread before.

title: That’s Not What My Will Said
summary:
In a world where extraordinary powers called *" Beneïsons "* govern everything; only a boy named Kleis was granted the gift of the *" Seint Graal "*, a power whose use he could not even understand.

Despite this, he did not lose heart and formed a party with his childhood friend Hinoka, who possessed the beneïson of the *" Seint de l'Espee "*, to carry out guild missions. However, due to a minor misunderstanding and betrayal, his mind and body were shattered.

At the same time, Kleis' beneïson revealed its true potential. The *" Seint Graal "* was the pinnacle of power, capable of granting any beneïson in existence to himself or others.

Having lost everything, yet now holding the power to gain everything, what will he choose? The end of the world or something else?

title: The Ordinary Lawyer’s Subspace
summary:
A strange door appears in front of lawyer Han Beom-sang.

Beyond it lies a space where time stands still.

title: Fall in Love or Die
summary:
At the mysterious orphanage where Sheena lives, death is nothing new to its residents—girls who no longer have families of their own, who are raised as weapons of war, taught to kill and take the lives of others without batting an eye. Everyone, that is, except Sheena, who wishes for nothing more than the growing conflict around her to end.

On the night of her roommate’s death, Sheena meets a strange girl covered in blood, who smiles despite the turmoil surrounding them. The next day, the girl appears as a new student in Sheena's class and introduces herself as Mimi. Initially thought to be a school myth, there are now whispers in the orphanage’s halls that Mimi is their secret weapon—an immortal who cannot die. 

When Mimi is later assigned as Sheena’s new roommate, Sheena’s world grows even more complicated when she begins living with someone who loves and welcomes death, when all Sheena wants to do is stop it… 

A story of two girls' innocent wishes, found in a world next to death.

title: I will break ties with the harmful sister
summary:
Clara, who had been oppressed for many years by her tyrant sister, Enefia. Even their parents obeyed the sister's wishes, and Clara had no place in the Astraia Baron’s household despite it being her home. In the midst of this, Clara's sister's engagement to a prominent nobleman was decided, and Clara finally felt relieved, believing she would be freed from this hell. However, even after the engagement, the sister's unfaithful nature did not change, and fearing the fiancé might discover the inconvenient truth, the parents ordered Clara to monitor her sister. Despite Clara's efforts, her sister became pregnant with another man's child. The engagement was broken off, and the sister quickly eloped somewhere, leaving the Astraia Baron’s household with a huge debt, angering the influential nobleman. In order to repay her family's debts, Clara was sold to a sadistic noble and faced severe torture, ultimately approaching death.

"If I could do it over again... This time, I will definitely kill you!" When Clara opened her eyes again, time had rewound to the day of her sister’s engagement. Revived with strong determination, Clara pushed back against her sister's insidious bullying and ran to change the worst possible future.

title: Black Haze (2025)
summary: A long time ago, a portal to another world was opened, and those who acquired special abilities along with marks began to be called mages. After the incident known as "that day", the first-class mage from Ophion, known as "Blow", has become very famous. One day, he receives a very special mission: to protect the second son of the Artian family, who suffers from being called a "monster" at the magic school "Helios"! Thus, Blow enrolls in Helios under the name "Rood Krisch" to hide his true identity...

title: Absolute Sword Sense
summary:
For as long as he can remember, Woonhwi So has been the black sheep of his family and clan. Because his spirit core has been destroyed, he has no choice but to serve as a third-rate spy for the Blood Cult.

One day, during his mission to find the legendary Blade Scroll, he is killed and sent 10 years into the past. When Woonhwi regains consciousness, he realizes that he has been sent back to the day he was kidnapped by the Blood Cult, and that he has gained a mysterious ability to hear the voice of a dagger.

title: The Symbiotic Relationship Between the Rabbit and the Black Panther
summary:
I was a rabbit shapeshifter who couldn't even transform into a human by my coming of age ceremony. My family said that I was just a halfling and placed me in a basket…

"You're crying? Go on, cry more."

Then I was then picked up by a black panther with an awful personality.

"You're lacking in fighting spirit. I'll eat you the day after tomorrow, so keep trying."

This fierce beast. Staring at my trembling face, the black panther's eyes glistened.

"How thrilling."

Mom, I think he's crazy! To survive a fairly crazy black panther.

"The wild beasts are possessive, no matter what it is."

…Is it possible?

---
Vivi is a... wererabbit?! As a creature that’s supposed to transform into a human, Vivi is a failure, demonized as cursed and sent off to her doom. Luckily, her demise is cut short as Ahin of the Black Leopard Clan saves her. But with every threat and command this temperamental heir tosses at Vivi, she’s questioning her safety (and sanity). Surrounded by carnivores and their strong pheromones, she'll try to survive the chaos while stuck in her rabbit form. Will she figure out how to transform and tap into the power within her cute, furry self?

title: She Becomes Glamorous After The Engagement Annulment
I Want To Be Fooled
summary:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.

title: Devil’s Wish
summary:
Young orphaned adventurer tries summoning the devil to help his career as his own skills are lacking. The devil comes in form of a beauty who offers to grant him one wish. 
He’s so enamored with her appearance that he asks her the first thought in his mind, to be his wife. She blushingly agrees to his surprising demand to join in his future adventures together.
